holidays.title: Day of the Dead
holidays.description: It is believed that the souls of the dead return to visit their living family members.

holidays.title: National Deviled Egg Day
holidays.description: Deviled eggs are hard boiled, cut in half, and filled with — well, that's up to you!

holidays.title: All Souls Day
holidays.description: It is a centuries-old tradition in Western Christianity.

holidays.title: All Souls Day (Brazil)
holidays.description: Learn how Brazilians observe this holiday and check out ways to partake.

holidays.title: Arrival of Indentured Labourers
holidays.description: Discover how indentured laborers in Mauritius played a huge contribution to the country's development.

holidays.title: Be the Impact Day
holidays.description: Each day’s an opportunity to make an impact; you’re responsible for making it a positive one!

holidays.title: Broadcast Traffic Professionals Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate this day in style and acknowledge the work of broadcasting professionals.

holidays.title: Dynamic Harmlessness Day
holidays.description: As we celebrate Dynamic Harmlessness Day, do the least harm and the most good.

holidays.title: Feast of St. Giusto
holidays.description: Join the people of Trieste in celebrating an icon of the Christian faith!

holidays.title: International Day to End Impunity for Crimes Against Journalists
holidays.description: Let us denounce any assaults and all on journalists and media professionals.

holidays.title: Look for Circles Day
holidays.description: Get circling and looking for circles with our great article on this day.

holidays.title: National Advent Calendar Day
holidays.description: Get your shopping list ready — coffee, mugs, chocolate, and wine all make for a merry season.

holidays.title: National Ohio Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the enduring spirit of Ohioans and the alluring landscape of the great state of Ohio!

holidays.title: National Stress Awareness Day
holidays.description: Don’t worry; everything will be OK! Just live in the moment and destress your life

holidays.title: Traffic Directors Day
holidays.description: Celebrate and appreciate the behind-the-scenes work of your local broadcast professionals.

holidays.title: World Ballet Day
holidays.description: Put on your ballet shoes and celebrate one of the most adored dance forms in history.

holidays.title: Aga Khan III’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about the leader who governs no country but has over 15 million followers.

holidays.title: Brielle Barbusca’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rising model, actress, and movie star has shown that she knows how to excel.

holidays.title: Daniel Boone’s Birthday
holidays.description: Before Springsteen, Boone was the personification of the American spirit. Let us celebrate him today!

holidays.title: David Schwimmer’s Birthday
holidays.description: Pivot! Pivot! PIVOT! There is no turning back now for this famous actor!

holidays.title: Dess Dior’s Birthday
holidays.description: She's been on the social media scene since she was in her teens! Let's celebrate her!

holidays.title: Dylan Dauzat’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this Disney star-turned-realtor, the future is as safe as a house of bricks!

holidays.title: Hannah Hart’s Birthday
holidays.description: She might fail at making cheeseless grilled cheese but she never fails to entertain us.

holidays.title: James K. Polk’s Birthday
holidays.description: Polk was responsible for the territorial expansion of the U.S. into what it is today.

holidays.title: Jimmy Garoppolo’s Birthday

holidays.title: Josh Wiggins’s Birthday
holidays.description: "The Bachelors" received good ratings from critics, and it further strengthened Wiggins' reputation as a star.

holidays.title: JP Cooper’s Birthday
holidays.description: J.P. Cooper is a soul singer who started his career as an independent artist.

holidays.title: KD Lang’s Birthday
holidays.description: Lang was once known only in Canada, but the country artist made herself known worldwide.

holidays.title: Kendall Schmidt’s Birthday
holidays.description: Kendall Francis Schmidt's family relocated from Kansas to Burbank, California, when he was 10.

holidays.title: Marie Antoinette’s Birthday
holidays.description: Renowned for her extravagance, indifference to public opinion, and fashion sense, she lives large in history!

holidays.title: Nelly’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rapper and singer has blessed the world with his musical gifts.

holidays.title: Nickayla Rivera’s Birthday
holidays.description: Beauty is her name inside and out. Today, we get to learn about her.

holidays.title: RanbooLive’s Birthday

holidays.title: Shah Rukh Khan’s Birthday

holidays.title: Soy Luigi’s Birthday

holidays.title: Toni Logan’s Birthday
